tag_list: entrepreneur, allergy, ige, engineer, stock-trader, futures-trader, ceo
overview: MarketHEIST, LLC. CEO Jeffrey Lin graduated from Harvey Mudd College with a BS Engineering & a BS in Mathematical Economics. Previously, Jeffrey ran the financial media company FINZ.tv focusing on trading videos with a stock market analysis magazine. As an independent trader, he has used numerous tools and has extensive market & trading experience in stocks, futures, and options. He is also a web developer, graphics designer, and video producer. His greatest accomplishments is his daily survival of a unique allergy condition where every food, smell, and compound on earth is essentially toxic to him. This condition has confined him to his home for years and led to him discovering trading and investing for himself.
